snippet.title: Man in serious condition after Coast motorbike collision
snippet.content: UPDATE: A MOTORBIKE rider has been transported to hospital in a serious condition after a collision with a car. The man in his 50s was transported to the Sunshine Coast University Hospital with a critical care paramedic and is in a serious yet stable condition. He is reportedly suffering from neck and lower leg injuries. BREAKING: A MAN in his 50s is being treated for a leg injury after a car and motorbike collided in Cooroibah this afternoon. Ambulance crews were called to Coral Fern Dr and McKinnon Dr at 3.11pm and a critical care paramedic is on scene. It's believed the patient, who is also suffering neck and back pain, is the motorbike rider - but this is yet to be confirmed. Traffic updates indicate lanes are blocked and drivers are advised to avoid the area. More to come.
